entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 27. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers late this afternoon. Risk of thunderstorms late this afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High 27. UV index 7 or high. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low 11. POP 30%
